item.title: About me
item.description: Projects I am a team member of Droidian GNU/Linux. You can watch me presenting this project on a live stream linked below. I have also contribute to GNOME Music Player You can also find me on Twitter and on GitHub.
item.content:
Projects

I am a team member of Droidian GNU/Linux. You can watch me presenting this project on a live stream linked below.

I have also contribute to GNOME Music Player

You can also find me on Twitter and on GitHub.
